bibl.title: Letter from C.R. Darnall to Mabel H. Lazear, June 6, 1922

div1.p: Darnall requests that Mabel Lazear send information related to the annuity directly to the Surgeon General.

div1.head: Letter from C.R. Darnall to Mabel H. Lazear, June 6, 1922
div1.opener:
IN REPLY REFER TO S. G. O. 200.4-1
bbt/mlj
WAR DEPARTMENT
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
WASHINGTON
June 6, 1922.
Mrs. Mabel Lazear,
218 East Padre St.,
Santa Barbara, Cal.
Dear Madam:
div1.p:
Referring to my letter to you of the 3rd instant requesting
certain information in connection with your annuity from the War Depart-
ment, the Surgeon General now directs me to ask that you furnish the
desired information direct to him and not to Mr. Anthony as suggested.
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, C. R. Darnall, AAD
Colonel, Medical Corps. ALL COMMUNICATIONS SHOULD BE ADDRESSED TO “THE SURGEON GENERAL, U. S. ARMY, WASHINGTON, D. C.”
